## ts-basic-config package

A small library for common math functions

## Functions

| Function                                   | Description                                             |
| ------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| [avg(a, b, c)](./ts-basic-config.avg.md)   | Calculate the average of three numbers                  |
| [sum3(a, b, c)](./ts-basic-config.sum3.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Calculate the sum of three numbers |
